mapper.select: select * from webadmin.tb_mt_co_svrinfo where type = 'POSTGRESQL' order by sys_nm desc

SELECT T1.USER_NM AS USER_NM, T1.USER_ID AS USER_ID, T1.USER_PW AS USER_PW, T1.AUTH_DV AS AUTH_DV, T1.JGD AS JGD, T1.BLG AS BLG, T1.DEPT AS DEPT, T1.HPNM_NO AS HPNM_NO, T1.USE_YN AS USE_YN, T1.CG_BIZ_DEF AS CG_BIZ_DEF, T1.LT_WK_PRSN AS LT_WK_PRSN, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.user_expd, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS user_expd, T1.PG_MON_CLIENT_PATH AS PG_MON_CLIENT_PATH, T1.ENC_MNG_PATH AS ENC_MNG_PATH FROM webadmin.tb_mt_CO_USER T1 WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}

SELECT T1.USER_NM AS USER_NM, T1.USER_ID AS USER_ID, T1.USER_PW AS USER_PW, (SELECT SYS_MNT_CD_NM FROM webadmin.tb_mt_CO_CODEGRPDTL S2 WHERE S2.SYS_GRPCD='C0001' AND S2.SYS_MNT_CD = T1.auth_dv ) AS auth_dv, T1.JGD AS JGD, T1.BLG AS BLG, T1.DEPT AS DEPT, T1.HPNM_NO AS HPNM_NO, (SELECT SYS_MNT_CD_NM FROM webadmin.tb_mt_CO_CODEGRPDTL S2 WHERE S2.SYS_GRPCD='C0007' AND S2.SYS_MNT_CD = T1.use_yn ) AS use_yn, T1.CG_BIZ_DEF AS CG_BIZ_DEF, T1.LT_WK_PRSN AS LT_WK_PRSN, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.user_expd, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS user_expd, T1.PG_MON_CLIENT_PATH AS PG_MON_CLIENT_PATH, T1.ENC_MNG_PATH AS ENC_MNG_PATH FROM webadmin.tb_mt_CO_USER T1 WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO webadmin.tb_mt_co_user( user_id, user_pw, user_nm, jgd, auth_dv, blg, dept, hpnm_no, use_yn, cg_biz_def, lt_wk_dtti, lt_wk_prsn, user_expd, pg_mon_client_path, enc_mng_path) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_nm}, #{jgd}, #{auth_dv}, #{blg}, #{dept}, #{hpnm_no}, #{use_yn}, #{cg_biz_def}, TO_CHAR(now(),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{lt_wk_prsn}, #{user_expd}, #{pg_mon_client_path}, #{enc_mng_path});

insert into webadmin.tb_mt_co_auth_info(user_id, menu_id) values (#{user_id}, (select id from webadmin.tb_mt_co_menu_info where item_order=(select parent_id from webadmin.tb_mt_co_menu_info where id=#{menu_id}) and parent_id = 0));
mapper.delete: delete from webadmin.tb_mt_co_auth_info where user_id=#{user_id} and menu_id=#{menu_id}
